org.dspace.xmlworkflow.storedcomponents.service

Interface WorkflowItemRoleService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DSpaceCRUDService<WorkflowItemRole>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    WorkflowItemRoleServiceImpl

    public interface WorkflowItemRoleService
extends DSpaceCRUDService<WorkflowItemRole>
    Service interface class for the WorkflowItemRole object. The implementation of this class is responsible for all business logic calls for the WorkflowItemRole object and is autowired by spring
    Author:
    kevinvandevelde at atmire.com
